## License: unknown
https://github.com/hasansujon786/dotfiles/blob/0a235c325f9ce944d0dd75ad1a3f7ce6c4b8384a/vscode/old-vim-plugin.jsonc

```
"vim.hlsearch": true,
    "vim.insertModeKeyBindings": [
        {
            "before": ["j", "k"],
            "after": ["<Esc>"]
        }
    ],
    "vim.normalModeKeyBindingsNonRecursive": [
        {
            "before"
```
